author: mariohavel
content: You should aim for a single project that you can dedicate to and define scope to finish by November. Of course most projects will have potential to continue, there are always follow up next steps but it's completely in your own agency to continue, not part of the fellowship

author: raymond_bu
content: Will we have a recording for the weekly meetings? 3pm utc is a bit late for Asia time zone. i may not be able to join each every session, but would like to watch the recording if i miss one

author: joshd4078
content: Yes we record both weekly meetings.
